text: Slither is a 2006 science fiction horror movie directed by James Gunn. It didnâ€™t do well at the box office but got a cult following. ==Cast== *Nathan Fillion as Police Chief Bill Pardy *Elizabeth Banks as Starla Grant *Michael Rooker as Grant Grant *Tania Saulnier as Kylie Strutemyer *Gregg Henry as Mayor Jack MacReady *Jenna Fischer as Shelby Cunningham Category:2006 comedy movies Category:2006 science fiction movies Category:2006 horror movies Category:2000s black comedy movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies directed by James Gunn Category:Movies with screenplays by James Gunn Category:Universal Pictures Category:Movies set in the 2000s
title: Slither (2006 movie)
